faq.question: What is a Data Science course?
faq.answer: A Data Science course teaches you to extract insights from data using Python, statistics, machine learning, deep learning, and visualization tools.

faq.question: Do I need coding experience?
faq.answer: No! We start from the basics. You will learn Python programming as part of the course.

faq.question: What tools will I learn?
faq.answer: Python, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, Keras, SQL, Power BI, Tableau and NLP tools.

faq.question: Is Data Science good for freshers?
faq.answer: Yes! Companies hire freshers for Data Scientist, ML Engineer, and Analyst positions.

faq.question: Do you provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes. We provide 100% placement support with resume prep, mock interviews, and daily job openings.

faq.question: Is there a certificate after completion?
faq.answer: Yes, you will receive Course Completion and Internship Certificates recognized by IT companies.

faq.question: Do you provide real-time projects?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You will complete projects in ML, DL, forecasting, NLP, and visualization.

faq.question: Can non-IT students join?
faq.answer: Yes! Many students from B.Com, BBA, Civil, Mechanical, ECE, and others have successfully transitioned into Data Science.

faq.question: Do you offer online and offline classes?
faq.answer: Yes, both modes are available and switching between them is free.
